name: e2e-tests
description: For running end to end tests we use testcafe (https://testcafe.io/) along with its official electron plugin (https://github.com/DevExpress/testcafe-browser-provider-electron)

scripts.test:build: lerna run distUbuntu --scope quiet --stream && npm run test:create && npm run test:join
scripts.test:dev: npm run build:app && npm run test
scripts.test:create: npm run build:testcafe && cross-env DATA_DIR=e2eCreate E2E_TEST=true DEBUG='backend*,state-manager*,e2e*,desktop*,testcafe:*electron*' testcafe "electron:../desktop" "./**/newUser.e2e.ts"
scripts.test:create:return: npm run build:testcafe && cross-env DATA_DIR=e2eCreate E2E_TEST=true DEBUG='backend*,state-manager*,e2e*,desktop*,testcafe:*electron*' testcafe "electron:../desktop" "./**/newUser.returns.e2e.ts" --skip-js-errors
scripts.test:join: npm run build:testcafe && cross-env DATA_DIR=e2eJoin E2E_TEST=true DEBUG='backend*,state-manager*,e2e*,testcafe:*electron*' testcafe "electron:../desktop" "./**/joiningUser.e2e.ts"
scripts.test:lazy: npm run build:testcafe && cross-env DATA_DIR=e2eLazy E2E_TEST=true DEBUG='backend*,state-manager*,e2e*,desktop*,testcafe:*electron*,-state-manager:test' testcafe "electron:../desktop" "./**/lazyLoading.e2e.ts"
scripts.test:smoke: npm run build:testcafe && cross-env DATA_DIR=e2e E2E_TEST=true DEBUG='backend*,state-manager*,e2e*,testcafe:*electron*' testcafe "electron:." "./**/smokeTest.e2e.ts"
scripts.test:files: npm run build:testcafe && cross-env DATA_DIR=e2eFiles E2E_TEST=true DEBUG='backend*,state-manager*,e2e*,testcafe:*electron*' testcafe "electron:../desktop" "./**/filesSending.e2e.ts" --skip-js-errors
